description:
Check out Ridge! https://ridge.com/AUSTINEVANS

YouTuber Duck Suit on Amazon: https://austin.tech/youtubeoutfit
Stylophone on Amazon: https://austin.tech/stylophone
AI Hand Warmer on Amazon: https://austin.tech/handwarmer
Shage Icemag Wireless Battery Bank on Amazon: https://austin.tech/icemag
Redragon K552 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard on Amazon: https://austin.tech/redragonk552
Redragon M602 Gaming Mouse on Amazon: https://austin.tech/m602
Andonstar HDMI Digital Microscope on Amazon: https://austin.tech/microscope

I decided to put Amazon's new AI assistant Rufus to the test by having it pick out some cool tech gadgets for me. What started as a skeptical experiment quickly turned into a surprisingly fun unboxing adventure, with everything from a miniature go-kart to a powerful digital microscope. While not every item was a winner, Rufus managed to find some genuinely impressive and entertaining tech that I probably wouldn't have
title: Buying EVERYTHING Amazon's AI Recommends
